alert.note: Alert for Northern Nye County - Mojave (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 12 at 7:51PM PDT until June 13 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM PDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 426... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 426... The red flag warning for today is being allowed to expire at 8pm. However, a red flag warning for Monday is still in effect from 11 am to 8 pm PDT for strong gusty winds and low relative humidity. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 426 Northern Nye County- Mojave. * Winds...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
